text: Oh, That Nastya! () is a 1971 Soviet family movie directed by Yuri Pobedonostsev.Евгений Крылатов оставил нам «Прекрасное далеко»ОХ, УЖ ЭТА НАСТЯ! It stars Irina Volkova, Tatyana Nevskaya, and Sergei Kuskov. == Actors == * Irina Volkova as Nastya (Anastasia) * Tatyana Nevskaya as Lyuba Sitnikova * Sergei Kuskov as Edik Syroyegin * Natalya Gvozdikova as Sveta Ryabinina * Aleksandr Kharitonov as Sasha Zharikov * Svetlana Kotikova as Maryana Borisovna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1971 movies Category:Soviet family movies
title: Oh, That Nastya!
